entries.meaning: Similar to, characteristic of, or pertaining to gorillas.
examples: Against the backdrop of these global and local climatic changes, the LCA of African apes and humans split into a gorilline clade and Pan-Homo clade, and the latter split again into panin and hominin clades.

entries.meaning: (zoology) Any  hominid in the proposed subfamily Gorillinae (corresponding to the tribus Gorillini).
